{"id":874756409,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1673272528,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"24 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/874756409/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"71.6 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\n        ListNode *temp=new ListNode;\n        ListNode *ans=temp; \n        int carry=0;\n        while(l1!=NULL || l2!=NULL || carry){\n            int sum=0;\n            if(l1!=NULL){\n                sum+=l1->val;\n                l1=l1->next;\n            }\n            if(l2!=NULL){\n                sum+=l2->val;\n                l2=l2->next;\n            }\n            sum+=carry;\n            carry=sum/10;\n            ListNode* newnode=new ListNode(sum%10);\n            temp->next= newnode;\n            temp=temp->next;\n        }\n        return ans->next;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers","has_notes":false}
